intro: Bilolok i minim Kava long lanwej long wan vilij long ist, saot-ist Malekula long Vanuatu.

app.install_app_subtitle: Yu save openem Bilolok app lo fon blong yu olsem wan app
app.install_app_body: I mekem Bilolok app stap lo hom skrin blong fon blong yu. I isi blong kam bak lo Bilolok tumoro.
app.no_service_worker_body: Web browser blong yu i no supotem Service Workers minim se sam samting long Bilolok i no save wok gud mo Bilolok app bae i no hariap tumas. Yu sud usum wan web browser we hemi no olfala tumas.

home.hero: Luk ol kava bar long map!
home.end_of_feed: Ol Post Blong Tete i Finis ia.
home.end_of_feed_extra: Traem lukluk map blo lukaotem ol narafala samting long Bilolok.

nakamal.confirm_delete: Yu wantem aotem kava bar ia?
nakamal.tab_timeline_be_first_to_checkin: I no kat jek-in long kava bar ia iet. Yu save mekem jek-in festaem long ol narafala man!
nakamal.tab_images_none: No kat pikja blong kava bar ia iet
nakamal.chief_what_is_this: Hemia man we namba blong jek-in blong hem i bitim ol narafala man lo las 30 dei.

user.remove_profile_image_confirm: Yu wantem aotem profael pikja blong yu?
user.favorite_nakamals: Ol Favorite Kava Bar Long Manis Ia
user.favorite_nakamals_none: No kat jek-in long manis ia
user.no_activity_private_body: Taem yu usum Bilolok app ia, bambae yu luk ol samting we yu mekem lo ples ia olsem ol pikja, ol video, ol jek-in long kava bar blong yu.
user.no_activity_public_body: Man ia i no kat samting we hemi sharem lo pablik.

auth.register_available: Yu no bin joenem Bilolok iet?
auth.email_not_verified_body: Imeil blong yu no kat verification iet. Yu no save mekem sam samting long Bilolok app ia kasem taem yu mekem verification blong imeil blong yu.
auth.verify_email: Confirm se imeil ia hemi blong mi
auth.verify_email_body: Yu klik long hemia i minim se imeil ia hemi imeil blong yu. Afta, bambae yu save uploadem pikja, jek-in lo kava bar, mo ol nara samting long Bilolok.

alert.auth_required_subtitle: Tabu blong mekem samting ia taem yu no saen in
alert.auth_required_body: Mifala mekemsua ol user i saen in blong mekem sam samting.
alert.email_verification_required_title: Yu Mas Mekem Verification blong Imeil
alert.email_verification_required_subtitle: Tabu blong mekem samting ia taem yu no mekem verification blong imeil blong yu
alert.email_verification_required_body: Mifala mekemsua ol user i mekem verification blong imeil blong olgeta. Spos no, ol man i save mekem no gud samting long Bilolok.
alert.email_verification_sent_body: Long imeil we mifala sendem, bambae yu save confirm se imeil hemi blong yu.
alert.email_verification_missing_token_title: No save confirm imeil blong yu
alert.email_verification_missing_token_body: No kat imeil verification token long rikwest blong yu.
alert.password_reset_success_body: Noaia yu save saen in wetem niufala paswod blong yu.
alert.password_reset_fail_body: Sori, mifala no save mekem niufala paswod blong yu. Yu mas askem wan niufala imeil blong mekem niufala paswod.
alert.password_reset_missing_token_body: Imeil blong mekem niufala paswod i olfala tumas o i no gud.

video.not_supported: Sori, web browser blong yu i no supportem video. Yu save luk video lo link ia.
video.processing: Video blong yu i no redi iet.
video.error: Sori, samting i mekem video blong yu no gud. Sestem i bagerap. Bambae mifala aotem video ia spos mifala no save fiksim.
